      Returns the suit of the card that is drawn.

      Returns the face of the card if a face card is drawn.

        public boolean isFace()
        Returns the face of the card if a face card is drawn.

        Returns the ace card if an ace is drawn.
        Returns:
        The ace card.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the card that is drawn.
        Returns:
        The name of the card (2 through 10, jack, king, queen, ace).

      • getSuite

        public int getSuite()
        Returns the suit of the card that is drawn.
        Returns:
        The suit of the card (diamonds, spades, clubs, and hearts).

      • getValue

        public int getValue()
        Returns the number value of the card drawn.
        Returns:
        The value of the card (2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, or 11).
